heroDescription: I'm a full-stack developer passionate about building responsive web applications, creating clean APIs, and crafting elegant user experiences.
aboutDescription: I'm a full-stack web developer with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies. I enjoy building performant, maintainable websites and applications that provide meaningful user experiences. Whether it's crafting elegant UIs or building RESTful APIs, I aim to write clean, efficient code and stay up-to-date with modern development practices.
educationInstitution2: Salah Eddine El Ayoubi, Sidi Maarouf Casablanca — 2022
